thread.title: Listen to 5 Best Spice Girls' 'Wannabe' Remixes
thread.title_full: Listen to 5 Best Spice Girls' 'Wannabe' Remixes

author: Allison Hazel
title: Listen to 5 Best Spice Girls' 'Wannabe' Remixes

organizations.name: best spice girls' 'wannabe' remixes ray burmiston/photoshot/getty images spice girls

text:
Ray Burmiston/Photoshot/Getty Images Spice Girls photographed backstage at the Brit Awards in Feb. 1997. 
Today (Feb. 22), marks the 20th anniversary of the Spice Girl’s debut single “Wannabe”, which went No. 1 in 37 counties. It remains among the highest selling records of all time with over 7 million copies moved worldwide. 
In honor of the iconic pop jam's anniversary, here are 5 of the best remixes of the Spice Girls’ hit. 
Spice Girls - “Wannabe” (Peacemakers & BVNKZ Remix) 
This quality remix begins with a heavy dance beat before mellowing out. 
Spice Girls - “Wannabe” (Alex Lodge Remix) 

Spice Girls - “Wannabe” (Team Rush Hour Remix) 
This reggaeton inspired “Wannabe” remix is literally perfect! 
If you’re a fan of electro-pop, this mix is for you. It’s pretty similar to the original but adds a party flair 

Spice Girls - “Wannabe” (Jimmy Lo’s ‘We Found Love’ Remix Reunion 2 Mix) 
Who would have guessed that the instrumental for “We Found Love” would blend so well with “Wannabe?" 

Spice Girls - “Wannabe” (Bobby Brown ’89 Remix) 
Spice Girls with some new jack swing flavor! This mashup blends Bobby Brown’s “Every Little Step” with “Wannabe,” putting a nostalgic spin on the hit.
